attributes.action: Stop child slavery funding illegal war with blood diamonds.
attributes.additional_details: Blood diamonds are gems that have been used by rebel groups to fund armed conflict and civil war.We want the goverment to help stop blood diamonds from being dug to fund illegal conflict in african LEDC (less economically developed countries) countries. The government could make new laws to try and help stop blood diamonds being used in as many countries as possible. children are being held slaves, to carry out hard labour in horrific conditions for an illegal cause.. Please help us campain against the digging of blood diamonds by signing our petition, Thank you...
